metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16680 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNOME file-roller before 3.29.91. It allows a single ./../ path traversal via a filename contained in a TAR archive, possibly overwriting a file during extraction.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file-roller - 3.28.0-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file-roller package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.28.0-1ubuntu1.1').
